org.demoiselle.signer.policy.impl.cades.pkcs7.impl

Class CAdESChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.demoiselle.signer.policy.impl.cades.pkcs7.impl.CAdESChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Checker, PKCS7Checker

    public class CAdESChecker
extends Object
implements PKCS7Checker
    Basic Implementation for digital signatures in PKCS7 Format.

      • getAttached

        public byte[] getAttached(byte[] signed)
        Deprecated. it not return validation data, use: AttachedContentValidation getAttached(byte[] signed, boolean validateOnExtract)
        Return the signed file content attached to the signature.
        Parameters:
        signed - Signature and signed content.
        Returns:
        content for attached signature

      • getAttached

        public AttachedContentValidation getAttached(byte[] signed,
                                             boolean validateOnExtract)
        Extracts the signed content from the digital signature structure, if it is a signature with attached content.
        Specified by:
        getAttached in interface PKCS7Checker
        Parameters:
        signed - Signature and signed content.
        validateOnExtract - TRUE (to execute validation) or FALSE (not execute validation)
        Returns:
        content for attached signature

      • checkSignatureByHash

        public List<SignatureInformations> checkSignatureByHash(String digestAlgorithmOID,
                                                        byte[] calculatedHashContent,
                                                        byte[] signedData)
                                                 throws SignerException
        Description copied from interface: PKCS7Checker
        Check a digital detached signature, informed by parameter signedData, based on calculated hash from content
        Specified by:
        checkSignatureByHash in interface Checker
        Specified by:
        checkSignatureByHash in interface PKCS7Checker
        Parameters:
        digestAlgorithmOID - OID of algorithm used to calculate a hash from content (ex: 2.16.840.1.101.3.4.2.1 )
        calculatedHashContent - calculated hash
        signedData - detached signature
        Returns:
        List<SignatureInformations> list of signature informations
        Throws:
        SignerException

      • checkSignatureByHashes

        public List<SignatureInformations> checkSignatureByHashes(Map<String,byte[]> hashes,
                                                          byte[] signedData)
                                                   throws SignerException
        Verifica a assinatura contra um mapa de hashes calculados a partir do mesmo conteúdo, mas usando algoritmos diferentes.
        Parameters:
        hashes - Um mapa cujas chaves são os OID dos algoritimos e os valores são o resultado do cálculo do hash para o algoritmo em questão
        signedData - Um envelope PKCS#7 ou CMS
        Returns:
        A lista de SignatureInformations encontradas
        Throws:
        SignerException
